item.description:
************* Time has been changed to 3:00 PM *************

Andrea pointed out that the restaurant opens at 3:00 PM on Sundays.  (The Directions page still says 12 noon but apparently those are the old hours.)  I have therefore changed the start time of the Meetup so I hope everyone can still make it!﻿﻿ ﻿ I apologize for any confusion or inconvenience!

Also, there is no limit to the number of people who can attend, but there is a limit of 12 dogs.  For this meetup only, your RSVP will count for your dog and the Guest field will count for additional dogs.  So, if you are bringing more than one dog, please enter a digit in the "guests" field.  For example, if you are bringing 2 dogs, enter a "1", for 3 dogs, enter a "2", etc.   When 12 dogs have RSVP'd, I will start a waiting list.

I will have to make a reservation so please RSVP as soon as possible!  (If you think you can make it, RSVP yes - you can always cancel if necessary.)  I am listing the deadline as April 30th.

**********************************************

Capri is a seaside Italian trattoria serving authentic Italian cuisine in a cozy setting. In winter of 2010, Capri became DOG FRIENDLY with a dedicated entrance and dining area for dog owners and their canine companions - one of the first full-service restaurants to offer this. We look forward to welcoming you and your pet and treating you to outstanding cuisine and first-class service, right on the shores of Salisbury Beach.

It looks like the Capri Seaside Italian Grille opens at 12 noon on Saturdays and Sundays.  I (Laura) am going to call for more info (i.e., if there is a maximum number of people and/or dogs, if there is a lunch menu, etc.).  This sounds like fun so I hope everyone can make it on the date I chose!  And if anyone knows of a place in Salisbury that we could go after to walk or hike, please let me know.  (I will try to research as well.) 

 

Website: http://www.capriseaside.com

You can view the dinner menu here:  

http://www.capriseaside.com/files/Caprimenu.pdf

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: Have lunch at Capris
